PSCT.Vegas:
① Send 1 Dragon from your Deck to the GY, then, if that monster in your GY is a Dragon Normal Monster, 
you can send 1 more Dragon monster from your Deck to the GY. 
(You can only activate 1 "Dragon Shrine" per turn).
PSCT.Meadowlands:
① Send 1 Dragon from your Deck to the GY, then, if that monster in your GY is a Dragon Normal Monster, 
you can send 1 more Dragon monster from your Deck to the GY. 
(You can only activate 1 "Dragon Shrine" per turn).
